You must comply with any specific requirements in the devolved nations that apply in respect of the holding deposit amount, e.g. Tenant Fees Act 2019 in England and the Renting Homes (Fees etc.) (Wales) Act 2019 in Wales.", "Portal_Field_Example__c": "Non-assured shorthold tenancy 1000", "Portal_Name__c": "Zoopla", "Required__c": false, "Value_Mapping__c": null, "Name": "letting_arrangements" }, { "Allowed_Field_Datatype__c": "String", "Data_Type__c": null, "Listing_Field_API_Name__c": "Status__c", "Portal_Field_Description__c": "An indication as to where the listing is in its life cycle, from initial availability, through offers being made, to its legal conclusion.For rent: available -> under_offer -> let_agreed -> let.For sale: available -> under_offer -> sold_subject_to_contract -> sold.", "Portal_Field_Example__c": "available, under_offer, sold_subject_to_contract, sold, let_agreed, let,", "Portal_Name__c": "Zoopla", "Required__c": true, "Value_Mapping__c": "Off-Market => available,Pending => under_offer,Active => available,Under Contract => under_offer,Withdrawn => available,Sold => sold_subject_to_contract,Rented => let_agreed,Expired => available", "Name": "life_cycle_status" }, { "Allowed_Field_Datatype__c": "String", "Data_Type__c": null, "Listing_Field_API_Name__c": null, "Portal_Field_Description__c": "The grade assigned to the property should it be listed as a building of special architectural or historic interest.", "Portal_Field_Example__c": "category_a, category_b, category_c, grade_a, grade_b, grade_b_plus, grade_one, grade_two, grade_two_star, locally_listed", "Portal_Name__c": "Zoopla", "Required__c": false, "Value_Mapping__c": null, "Name": "listed_building_grade" }, { "Allowed_Field_Datatype__c": "String", "Data_Type__c": null, "Listing_Field_API_Name__c": "Broker_s_Listing_ID__c", "Portal_Field_Description__c": "Your unique identifier for the listing. This should be unique across your entire system, not just for its associated branch (i.e. this is the PRIMARY KEY). If your identifiers are based on those submitted by the agent themselves then you may wish to concatenate, with an unambiguous separator, your branch reference and their listing reference to ensure uniqueness (e.g. branch_id|agent_listing_id).", "Portal_Field_Example__c": "5678; dfhd-kjdf-1", "Portal_Name__c": "Zoopla", "Required__c": true, "Value_Mapping__c": null, "Name": "listing_reference"
